TopicTitle: Redesign the stock Mk3 Cargo bays, please.

Articles.Content:
My two biggest issues with the Mk3 Cargo bays are the wonky internal colliders and the way the doors open outward, attaching radial parts such as wings and engines cause the doors to clip when opened, making for unrealistic object physics.

My suggestion is to remodel the stock Mk3 Cargo bays with better internal colliders and make the doors **slide** open on the inside, like the ones found in the B9 Aerospace mod.

--UPDATED--

Better idea: keep the stock bays and make "Type B" cargo bays that slide open.

Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-24T04:30:06Z" title="07/24/2015 04:30  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 24, 2015</time> by Xyphos**
Perhaps a better option (been suggested before) is a slider in the VAB/SPH that let you set the max angle to doors open.
Sometimes, Mk.3 parts are not enough flat for me.
